Learning Resource Updates

New docs and major updates.

31-March-2023

New Docs

  • Title: SSAI Open Measurement with the Native SDK for Android
  • Description: In this topic, you will learn how to take advantage of the IAB Open Measurement SDK with the SSAI plugin for the Brightcove Native SDK for Android.
  • Link: https://sdks.support.brightcove.com/features/ssai-open-measurement-sdks.html
  • Title: Download Button Plugin
  • Description: In this topic, you will learn about the download plugin for Brightcove Player. This plugin will allow you to download an mp4 file of the video or a text file of the video transcript.
  • Link: https://player.support.brightcove.com/plugins/download-button-plugin.html
  • Title: Brightcove Support Slack
  • Description: In this topic you will learn how to use Slack to open a case with Brightcove Support.
  • Link: https://studio.support.brightcove.com/support/brightcove-support-slack.html
  • Title: Long Titles
  • Description: Behavior of Long Titles in the Beacon App
  • Link: https://beacon-help.support.brightcove.com/publishing-apps/general/long-titles.html
  • Title: Interactivity Viewer Plugin
  • Description: In this topic, you will learn about using the interactivity plugin to allow usage of Brightcove Interactivity functionality.
  • Link: https://player.support.brightcove.com/plugins/interactivity-viewer.html

Major updates

  • Title: 360°/VR Video Plugin
  • Description: Steps updated in implement using players module
  • Link: https://player.support.brightcove.com/plugins/360degvr-video-plugin.html#Implement_using_Players_module
  • Title: Overview: Brightcove Native SDK for iOS
  • Description: Native SDK for iOS release 6.12.1
  • Link: https://sdks.support.brightcove.com/ios/basics/overview-brightcove-player-sdk-ios.html
  • Title: Overview: Brightcove Native SDK for Android
  • Description: Native SDK for Android release 8.1.0
  • Link: https://sdks.support.brightcove.com/android/basics/overview-brightcove-player-sdk-android.html
  • Title: Google Analytics Self Configuration
  • Description: Updated for support of Google Analytics 4
  • Link: https://player.support.brightcove.com/general/ga-self-configure.html
  • Title: Skins and Player Versions'
  • Description: Table updated about changing the appearance and styling in skins
  • Link: https://player.support.brightcove.com/styling/skins-and-player-versions.html#Determine_current_skin
  • Title: Identify and Delete Low Performing Videos
  • Description: Updated the video and content to reflect new Studio UI
  • Link: https://player.support.brightcove.com/general/identify-and-delete-low-performing-videos.html

24-March-2023

New Docs

  • Title: Overview: Salesforce Sales Cloud Integration
  • Description: This integration connects Audience Insights to Salesforce Sales Cloud to update Contacts with insights into their video viewing.
  • Link: https://audience-insights.support.brightcove.com/integrations/salesforce-sales-cloud/overview-sfsc-integration.html
  • Title: Salesforce Connected App Setup
  • Description: For a third party integration to update content content within Salesforce, there needs to be a connected app set up in the Salesforce account to manage access to the Salesforce data.
  • Link: https://audience-insights.support.brightcove.com/integrations/salesforce-sales-cloud/salesforce-connected-app-setup.html
  • Title: Salesforce Properties Setup
  • Description: This topic will cover how to set up the properties in Salesforce that will be updated by the Audience Insights Salesforce publish integration.
  • Link: https://audience-insights.support.brightcove.com/integrations/salesforce-sales-cloud/salesforce-properties-setup.html
  • Title: Audience Insights Salesforce Integration Setup
  • Description: Once a connected app has been created in Salesforce, a Salesforce publish integration can be added to the Audience Insights system.
  • Link: https://audience-insights.support.brightcove.com/integrations/salesforce-sales-cloud/audience-insights-publish-integration-setup.html
  • Title: Index of Platform API Code Samples
  • Description: Index of all sample code and apps for the various Platform APIs.
  • Link: https://apis.support.brightcove.com/getting-started/index-code-samples.html

Major updates

  • Title: Brightcove Player Sample: Chapter Markers in Progress Bar
  • Description: Player example updated and fixed
  • Link: https://player.support.brightcove.com/code-samples/brightcove-player-sample-chapter-markers-progress-bar.html
  • Title: Brightcove-Shopify Integration Overview
  • Description: Added additional required configuration step discovered during testing
  • Link: https://integrations.support.brightcove.com/ecommerce/shopify/brightcove-shopify-commerce-platform-overview.html
  • Title: Using Live Redundancy
  • Description: Added note that including h264_profile": "baseline in any output is not supported by Redundancy and may call the stream to stall or become unstable.
  • Link: https://apis.support.brightcove.com/live-api/guides/using-live-redundancy.html
  • Title: Google Tag Manager Plugin for Brightcove Player
  • Description: Added note and step for using Advanced embed code with GTM plugin
  • Link: https://player.support.brightcove.com/plugins/google-tag-manager-plugin-brightcove-player.html
  • Title: Plugin Version Reference
  • Description: Brightcove Player 7.x plugin URLs Table Added
  • Link: https://player.support.brightcove.com/plugins/plugin-version-reference.html
  • Title: Overview: Brightcove Player Plugins
  • Description: Added latest plugins and a new table with links to all plugins' changelogs.
  • Link: https://player.support.brightcove.com/plugins/overview-brightcove-player-plugins.html
  • Title: Plugin Registry
  • Description: Added latest plugins and new content
  • Link: https://player.support.brightcove.com/plugins/plugin-registry.html

17-March-2023

New Docs

  • Title: Overview: Salesforce Sales Cloud Integration
  • Description: This integration connects Video Cloud to Salesforce Sales Cloud to update Contacts with insights into their video viewing.
  • Link: https://studio.support.brightcove.com/integrations/salesforce-sales-cloud/overview-sfsc-integration.html
  • Title: Salesforce Connected App Setup
  • Description: For a third party integration to update content content within Salesforce, there needs to be a connected app set up in the Salesforce account to manage access to the Salesforce data.
  • Link: https://studio.support.brightcove.com/integrations/salesforce-sales-cloud/salesforce-connected-app-setup.html
  • Title: Salesforce Properties Setup
  • Description: This topic will cover how to set up the properties in Salesforce that will be updated by the Audience Insights Salesforce publish integration.
  • Link: https://studio.support.brightcove.com/integrations/salesforce-sales-cloud/salesforce-properties-setup.html
  • Title: Audience Insights Salesforce Integration Setup
  • Description: Once a connected app has been created in Salesforce, a Salesforce publish integration can be added to the Audience Insights system.
  • Link: https://studio.support.brightcove.com/integrations/salesforce-sales-cloud/audience-insights-publish-integration-setup.html
  • Title: Brightcove-Shopify Integration Overview
  • Description: Brightcove's integration with Shopify allows you to find, manage, and modify your Brightcove Video Cloud videos within your Shopify store dashboard.
  • Link: https://integrations.support.brightcove.com/ecommerce/shopify/brightcove-shopify-commerce-platform-overview.html
  • Title: Using the Brightcove Video Connector for Shopify
  • Description: Manage videos from within Shopify and embed them in product pages.
  • Link: https://integrations.support.brightcove.com/ecommerce/shopify/using-shopify-with-brightcove.html
  • Title: Managing Live Events
  • Description: Create and run Live Events within Shopify and use them to promote your products.
  • Link: https://integrations.support.brightcove.com/ecommerce/shopify/managing-live-events.html

Major updates

  • Title: Configuring Custom Domains and SSL
